1.「……<pc>さま。| この紅き煙こそ 世界各国の王たちに| 漆黒の闇の訪れをし: ...<pc>. This red smoke is the smoke|of guidance that warns the kings of the world|of the coming of the darkness.

2.「この煙は またたく間に 世界中に広がり| 彼らの目に 触れることでしょう。|: In no time at all, this smoke will spread|around the world for them to see. And they|will remember the lore.

3.「王たちが 一堂に会した時……| 私は 世界の真実を お伝えせねばなりません。|: When the kings gather together I must tell|them the truth of the world. The cruel truth|that is etched in the memory of the stars.

4.「ですが それこそが 世告げの姫の主導者たる| 私の使命。この先 何があろうとも: But that is my mission as the leader of the|Oracle Princess. No matter what happens in the|future, I will fulfill that mission.
